name: Queso Blanco Hot Dip
description: Developed by one of our Community Innovation program winners, Lindsey Monger! Lindsey’s kids love white queso and she wanted to create something creamy with mild heat and simple ingredients.
preparation:
MICROWAVE:

  1. In 4-Cup Prep Bowl, whisk milk with mix. Microwave uncovered on high for 3 min, whisking halfway through. Vigorously stir in cheese and butter until melted.

STOVETOP:

  1. In Multipurpose Pot, whisk milk with mix. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, whisking constantly. Reduce heat; simmer, whisking often for 3 min or until thickened. Remove from heat and stir in cheese and butter until melted.
tips:
Swap in your favourite white cheese—try Monterey Jack or white cheddar.

For more heat, add canned green chilis.
